title: PM: Time to end discrimination and finish the fight for real equality (UK Cabinet Office) ...
text: ( Source : UK Cabinet Office ) under new agreement, names will not be visible of graduate recruitment applications, reducing potential discrimination leading graduate employers from across the public and private sector commit to new scheme
